programme.title: Breakfast with Stephen and Anne
programme.desc: It's Stephen and Anne here. Join us for the weekend breakfast show Britain is turning to. News from around our great country and the world is live here on GB News Breakfast.

programme.title: Saturday Morning Live with Esther...
programme.desc: …and Philip. Welcome the weekend with the husband and wife duo – both serving MPs – as they celebrate the country's triumphs in their Best of British feature, and look at the good news where you are.

programme.title: GB News
programme.desc: A pacey look at all the latest live and breaking news for the weekend from around the UK with our network of GB News reporters, plus views and debate from a wide range of perspectives.

programme.title: Garth Nix answers your questions: on JRR Tolkien, gaming and pronouncing characters' names
programme.desc: In an ongoing series, Guardian Australia is getting kids and young adults to do the hard work instead of us – by interviewing their favourite authors. Here, the author of the Old Kingdom/Abhorsen, Seventh Tower and Keys to the Kingdom fantasy series opens up about queer representation, perfectionism and his writing tips.

programme.title: Forcing cyclists to wear helmets will not save their lives | Do cyclists think they're above the law
programme.desc: Bicycle helmets are compulsory in countries such as Australia and New Zealand, among others, but as the Guardian's Peter Walker explains this does not help save lives. | Cyclists can be a nuisance, running red lights, riding on the pavement ... but are they dangerous, and if not, is it a problem if they break the law?

programme.title: Space to Be: the fight to keep this Belfast women's centre open
programme.desc: In the heart of the Village, a loyalist area in Belfast, the Windsor Women's Centre has fought a 30-year battle to keep its doors open. The centre, an oasis for vulnerable women, is deeply rooted in the community. As it faces financial insecurity and navigates the pandemic, will these women make it through their toughest year so far?

programme.title: The golden poison dart frog | If you eat beef, don't wash
programme.desc: The golden poison dart frog: 'Like holding a loaded gun' | The solution to California's drought: if you eat beef, don't wash

programme.title: Somali Night Fever
programme.desc: In the 1970s and 80s Mogadishu's airwaves were filled with Somali funk, disco, soul and reggae. Musicians rocking afros and bell-bottom trousers would perform at the city's trendiest nightclubs during the height of the country's golden era of music. But it was short-lived: a brutal civil war began, musicians fled to all corners of the world and the vibrant music scene came to an end.

programme.title: The secret world of Asian drag queens | Oklahoma rodeo: 'I can be gay and I can be a cowboy'
programme.desc: The secret world of Asian drag queens | Oklahoma rodeo: 'I can be gay and I can be a cowboy'

programme.title: Climate carnage: whose job is it to save the planet?
programme.desc: In November last year, the world's gaze focused on Glasgow at Cop26 as 'a historic, collective achievement' was forged between 200 countries – the Glasgow climate pact. Since then, unprecedented global events have threatened this commitment to limiting climate destruction, and the hopes of 'keeping 1.5 alive' have been dashed. We follow Fiona as she prepares for Cop27 in Egypt, asking presidents, global leaders, activists and scientists if global diplomacy is enough to save humanity from the brink of annihilation.

programme.title: Where the River Runs Red
programme.sub-title: a mining community caught between the past and a sustainable future
programme.desc: In the isolated west of Tasmania an ominous red river divides the small mining town of Queenstown. A result of copper run-off from a closed mine, it is an ever-present reminder of the town's history of environmental and industrial disaster. Where the River Runs Red explores a community in an economically crippled area caught between the past and a future that is less reliant on a mining economy.

programme.title: Nowt but a fleeting thing
programme.desc: A film about a young farmer's connection to the land, his animals and a changing world in the north of England. Battling against unsustainable farming methods and an unenthusiastic market, Adam Crowe continues to work on two neighbouring farms while fighting to launch his own business and breed a flock of sheep. In rural Britain, the threat of poverty is often frighteningly close

programme.desc: Super dogs: the race to win America's most famous dog show | City: the remarkable urban photographs of David Levene

programme.title: How a community fought the Louisiana floods | How algorithms are cutting Americans' healthcare
programme.desc: Torrential downpours in Louisiana led to catastrophic flooding in August 2016, submerging entire communities and displacing thousands of residents. Volunteers did whatever they could to help – rescuing stranded people, organising food and shelter and providing security. | US states are using algorithms to figure out whether people are eligible for public benefits and how much care they should receive. But it isn't without its problems.

programme.title: The Accidental Husband
programme.desc: Dr. Emma Lloyd (Uma Thurman) is a popular New York radio DJ whose sensible, practical love advice is listened to and loved by women everywhere. Off-air, her own life is equally successful with wedding plans to dependable fiancé Richard (Colin Firth) running smoothly, until that is she makes a chocking discovery: she's already married – and to someone else! With her life turned upside down, Emma franticly sets out to track down the mystery man to annul the marriage. However, as the truth unfolds, she discovers that following her own advice might not be as easy as she thought…

programme.title: Instructions Not Included
programme.desc: Valentin is Acapulco's resident playboy, until a former fling leaves a baby on his doorstep and takes off without a trace. Leaving Mexico for Los Angeles to find the baby's mother, Valentin ends up finding a new home for himself and his newfound daughter. An unlikely father figure, Valentin raises Maggie for six years, while also establishing himself as one of Hollywood's top stuntmen to pay the bills, with Maggie hilariously acting as his on-set coach. But their unique and offbeat family is threatened when Maggie's mother shows up out of the blue, and Valentin realizes he's in danger of losing his daughter - and his best friend.

programme.title: Datsche
programme.desc: Valentine, a New York actor, inherits a 'datcha' on a garden allotment in East Germany and goes to spend the summer there. In ist attic he finds Adam, a refugee hiding from deportation. Valentine promises to keep Adam's secret but the arrival of some couchsurfers and a nosy neighbour put their flat share to the test. A summer fairytale about friendships across borders and garden fences.

programme.title: Kids In America
programme.desc: A diverse group of high school students band together to peacefully stick it to their overbearing principal.

programme.title: Earthsea
programme.desc: A reckless youth is destined to become the greatest sorcerer that the mystical land of Earthsea has ever known. Starring: Isabella Rossellini and Danny Glover

programme.title: Earthsea
programme.desc: A reckless youth is destined to become the greatest sorcerer that the mystical land of Earthsea has ever known. Starring: Isabella Rossellini and Danny Glover

programme.title: Flight World War II
programme.desc: Caught in a battle between Allied and German Forces, a modern day 757 mysteriously travels back in time to 1940. In their desperation to return home safely, the plane's passengers manage to turn the tide that wins the war in Europe.

programme.title: Double Dragon
programme.desc: Evil meets its match in this daring martial arts adventure about two teen brothers out to stop an obsessed tycoon from finding both halves of a mystical talisman.

programme.title: Bonnie & Clyde: Justified
programme.desc: When Bonnie Parker met Clyde Barrow over a cup of hot chocolate, it sparked a legendary story. Their courtship took them through bank robberies, prison and a multi-state crime spree, which secured their place in history.

programme.title: Perfect on Paper
programme.desc: After being let down by yet another boyfriend in a long line of deadbeats, Natalie Holland has decided to make a change in her life. Thanks to an opportunity from her long time friend, Avery Goldstein, Natalie decides to move to Los Angeles and work with esteemed author, Beverly Wilcox, as an editor for Goldstein Publishing. Upon arrival, Avery tells Natalie that she needs to start dating men who not only look good in person, but have outstanding credentials that make them look good on paper. So, when she meets the handsome, but seemingly unambitious John Cooper, she makes a conscious effort to avoid falling for him.

programme.title: The King's Daughter
programme.desc: Hoping to achieve immortality, King Louis XIV (Pierce Brosnan) captures a mermaid and steals her life force, but a discovery by his illegitimate daughter threatens to ruin the king's plans

programme.title: Change Of Heart
programme.desc: Diane McCarthy produces a TV show for her arrogant ex-boyfriend, Jared. Diane would love to quit to focus on her successful blog but she can't afford to.

programme.title: Black Beauty
programme.desc: A young girl finds a way into the heart of a troubled horse

programme.title: Retreat to Paradise
programme.desc: Ellie tends to the injured and cantankerous Jordan as he heals from a shoulder injury. Though he struggles to learn to use his arm again, his attitude leaves Ellie wanting to leave him in his misery. But as they get to know each other more, Jordan starts to see Ellie is exactly who he wants in his life, and hopes Ellie feels the same way.

programme.title: The Baby Proposal
programme.desc: Layla Bennett and Derek Dray are the hosts of Wake Up, Chicago and for the folks at home, their chemistry is undeniable. Derek is incredibly protective about the format of Wakeup, Chicago while Layla is always looking to shake things up. One morning they discover an adorable baby named Poppy left in a basket in Laylas dressing room. The mother passed away and the caretaker is unable to care for Poppy and is convinced that Layla and Derek will make perfect parents.

programme.title: Power of Mothers – PSA
programme.desc: Being a mother requires wearing many different hats.

programme.title: Let's Make Sloppy Joes
programme.desc: Link presents a vegetarian version of this family favourite, using tofu instead of meat. Captain Cook has never heard of tofu in all his travels across the seven seas. Tofu is made from soya beans and has a bland, spongy flavour and texture, perfect for soaking up the zippy seasonings from the Sloppy Joe marinade. Link wonders if all foods can be marinated, leading to a fun lab experiment with Gastro Bob.

programme.title: Hero Mode
programme.desc: With her indie video game business on the brink of bankruptcy, Kate (Mira Sorvino) throws a Hail Mary and puts Troy (Chris Carpenter), her teenage coding genius son, in charge of creating a video game to save the company. It's a dream come true for Troy. But quite the opposite for the company's disgruntled coders (Sean Astin, Mary Lynn Rajksub, Erik Griffin) and their rival CEO (Nelson Franklin).

programme.title: Identical Love
programme.desc: After being left at the altar, Dr. Charlotte Hudson needs to escape life at home. She signs up to volunteer at a health clinic in a tropical country. But her plans of escaping are thrown off when she comes across her former fiancé's twin brother, Seth (a dentist), who is also volunteering with the clinic. As they spend time together, Seth falls in love with Charlotte, but she struggles to let go of seeing her fiancé every time she looks at Seth. The island romance will help her break free from the past and love Seth for who he is.

programme.title: Silver Lode
programme.desc: In Silver Lode, Dan Ballard is arrested by 4 Marshals for murder and theft but he denies the charges and searches for the real culprit even as the townsfolk start abandoning him.

programme.title: The Deadly Companions
programme.desc: An ex-army officer accidentally kills a woman's son and tries to make up for it by escorting the funeral procession through dangerous Indian territory.

programme.title: Molly And Lawless John
programme.desc: In New Mexico, a sheriff's unhappy mid-aged wife aids a condemned prisoner escape her husband's jail and elopes with the young and attractive outlaw to Mexico, pursued by the sheriff's posse.

programme.title: Running Target
programme.desc: In the Colorado Rockies, Sheriff Scott, heads a posse that is after four escaped convicts, and thought it is his sworn duty to return the men dead or alive, he is, as always, reluctant to kill his fellow man.

programme.title: Texas, Adios
programme.desc: A Texan sheriff and his younger brother travel across the border into Mexico to confront the man who killed their father.

programme.title: Radio Rebel
programme.desc: Tara Adams is just an ordinary high school junior, except for one little thing. Tara has a secret identity-she's Radio Rebel, the most popular radio DJ in Seattle.

programme.title: Hearts & Vines
programme.desc: A builder and decorator on a home renovation show end up quarantined during the holidays in the home they are renovating.

programme.title: Simply Irresistible
programme.desc: Magic and laughter are the main ingredients in this SIMPLY IRRESISTIBLE love story of a restaurant owner/chef and a department store executive who seem to have nothing in common.

programme.title: Starting Up Love
programme.desc: Jillian inherits a beautiful mountainside cabin after her long-lost, wealthy uncle dies. She plans to sell it, but handsome caretaker Liam makes her an offer she can't refuse, and sparks fly as they work to transform the cabin into a holiday resort.

programme.title: Meet My Valentine
programme.desc: Diagnosed with terminal cancer, Tom reconnects with his wife Valentine to create an online dating profile to secretly find her a replacement husband.

programme.title: Captain Sharky
programme.desc: Pint-sized swashbuckler Captain Sharky thinks he's the most dangerous pirate on the Seven Seas. To prove his bravery, he sets sail with Mikey, a well-behaved boy whose life Sharky has turned upside down, and Bonnie, a trouble-shooting girl who tends to assume command in every situation. This motley crew sails for big adventures as they thwart the plans of The Admiral and Old Bill the Pirate.

programme.title: 12 In a Box
programme.desc: At a school reunion dinner in a remote country mansion, a dozen people are offered the chance to collect a million pounds each if they can stay on the estate, cut off from the outside world, for 96 hours. With deaths, sexual intrigue, kidnapping, and spiralling levels of farce and confusion, the action barely pauses for breath as it heads towards its Will-they-or-won't-they-succeed climax.

programme.title: Detective McLean
programme.desc: Allison has an altercation with a famous women's soccer player and is accused of brutality. At home, Allison becomes concerned about Cameron's friend Chris's interest in Rachel.

programme.title: The Wedding Ring
programme.desc: Kate Sterling's entire life is about proposals. As a jewelry designer she's created rings for more happy couples than she can count, however none for herself yet. At her sister's marriage, Kate is given a second change to connect with her childhood sweetheart. Now she has to decide whether their feelings have changed, or if the wedding will re-kindle the sparks that once united them giving Kate the ring she's been waiting for her whole life.

programme.title: Calling for Love
programme.desc: Successful podcast host Samantha Desouza has a passion for music and an aversion to romance after a recent bad experience. Just when her show is thriving, she is thrown in the deep end by her boss and re-assigned to host Heartwaves, a feel-good love songs show with a segment that reunites lost loves. Despite her initial lack of enthusiasm, her first caller is the charismatic and charming Jake who has a problem she's determined to help solve. What they didn't expect was to fall for each other in the process. Now Sam must decide whether to shy away from love again, or to be a little more spontaneous and follow her heart…

programme.title: Bulldog Drummond's Peril
programme.desc: In this episode captain Drummond tries to find the killer of various people. All assassinations were provoked by a diamond of great value, but Drummond will face the danger.

programme.title: Phantom Ship
programme.desc: During a horrific storm at sea, the crew realizes that there is a murderer among them who is killing them off one by one.

programme.title: Rives
programme.desc: Armel Hostiou's haunting study of urban alienation follows three characters-a woman, a man, and a child-over the period of a single day in Paris.

programme.title: The Fear We Share
programme.desc: Living in fear of reproach, a man risks rejection and prepares an intimate feast for the object of his desire. His guest finds herself trapped in his unsettling company. She must adapt quickly to survive the evening.

programme.title: Flying Lessons
programme.desc: With her life at a crossroads, 25 year old Sophie Conway (MAGGIE GRACE) returns to the small town she always tried to forget. Once home, she's faced with past lovers, a tangled relationship with her Mother, and Harry Pleasant, an Alzheimer's patient who in quite an opposite fashion, shares in Sophie's struggle to remember.

programme.title: The Ape
programme.desc: Dr. Bernard Adrian is a kindly mad scientist who seeks to cure a young woman's polio. He needs spinal fluid from a human to complete the formula for his experimental serum.

programme.title: 17 Miracles: 17 Miracles
programme.desc: The pioneer trek across the plains of the Mormon pioneers.

programme.title: Memoirs Of An Invisible Man
programme.desc: When a government experiment goes awry it renders an innocent bystander invisible.

programme.title: Where Hands Touch

programme.title: Life of a king
programme.desc: The film tells the true story of Eugene Brown, an ex-convict who starts the Big Chair Chess Club.

programme.title: A Moving Romance
programme.desc: After inheriting her family's moving company, a young woman starts to clash with the manager who thought he was going to take over.

programme.title: Undercover Angel
programme.desc: When a little girl prays for a miracle to help her recently divorced mother settle in their new town and fixer-upper house, an angel posing as a handyman, is sent down from heaven to help. While trying to accomplish his mission, the angel falls for the mother, ultimately forcing him into the unlikeliest of choices.

programme.title: Maria My Love
programme.desc: A young woman named Ana is struggling to deal with her mother's death and her father's mistakes. In an effort to feel better, she reconnects with her half-sister Grace, (Lauren Fales) and, inspired by a new boyfriend (Brian Rieger), sets out on a quest to find someone to help. Though excited and hopeful when she meets an eccentric woman named Maria (Karen Black), she soon discovers Maria is a compulsive hoarder, and is swept up in a situation more emotionally and morally complicated than she had expected to find. Inspired by a true story.

programme.title: Intimate Stranger
programme.desc: Karen, the beautiful single mother of precious 9-year-old Justin, never really had much luck with love. This all seems to change when she falls for her “Prince Charming”, Dennis, who is both a caring gentleman and a great friend to her son. But her perfect world begins to crumble when she finds a black rose on her doorstep, hears noises in the attic and gets prank calls in the middle of the night. After breaking up with Dennis her life begins to turn upside down and strange things start happening. Questioning her own sanity and left alone by authorities, friends and family, she decides to take matters into her own hands- a dangerous decision that puts her life on the line…

programme.title: Secret Summer
programme.desc: Rachel tries to save a small towns library from being turned into a resort and turns to Jake, a writer, for help.

programme.title: Hint of Love
programme.desc: A cookbook literary agent with culinary training is tasked with helping elevate the brand of a food channel personality known for his convenience-oriented recipes. However, as the agent works with her client on a new cookbook, playfully clashing over everything from ingredients to tastes, she must choose between following the directions or her heart.

programme.title: Listen Out for Love
programme.desc: Peyton Pepper, a goal-driven podcast producer, is forced to mold Alex McKinney, a brash loose cannon, into her next star and create the perfect show to save both of their careers. That show comes in the form of finding Peyton's iconic idol, true love. But as the duo goes along for the ride, they are the ones who find love--once they open their hearts and listen.

programme.title: Life or Something Like It
programme.desc: What would you do if you thought you only had one week left to live? Would you radically change what was left of your life? Re-evaluate your values and priorities? Those are the last questions in the world that Lanie Kerrigan (Angelina Jolie) thought she'd ever have to face. A feature reporter at a Seattle television station, Lanie thinks her life is perfect. Perfect job. Perfect apartment. Perfect wardrobe. Perfect boyfriend.

programme.title: The Beauty Of Love
programme.desc: Emma has a lifestyle website that she puts her heart and soul into called “Classically Emma”. But when her numbers start trending down, she thinks she might've found her fix in a partnership with an ambitious millennial named Jill who has her own dreams.

programme.title: A Snapshot of Forever
programme.desc: After leaving her big city life behind, wedding photographer Jessie Brookes is happier than ever. When famous actor Nate Brown shows up on her parent's vineyard for his sister's wedding, she quickly realizes that there is more to him than meets the eye.

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Acrimony
programme.desc: A wife tired of standing by her devious husband is enraged when it becomes clear she has been betrayed.

programme.title: Far From Home

programme.title: Good Morning, Killer
programme.desc: An FBI agent begins to notice a pattern in a kidnapping case. A new lead leaves her questioning her theory.

programme.title: The Lazarus Effect
programme.desc: A group of medical students discover a way to bring dead patients back to life.

programme.title: Killers
programme.desc: Spencer is an assassin in love. But a picture-perfect marriage will not save the couple from becoming targets.

When a couple opts to put their apartment on the market over one crazy weekend, they discover that finding a new place is not about winding down but starting a whole new adventure!

programme.title: Let Go

Discontent parole officer Walter is struggling with the humdrums of married life, when three troublesome ex-cons are placed under his supervision. Little does Walter know that these eccentric strangers are the inspiration he was looking for!

programme.title: Everyone Says I Love You

With a star-studded cast, including, Julia Roberts, Drew Barrymore, Tim Roth, Goldie Hawn and Natalie Portman. Set in some of the worlds most romantic cities, this whirlwind of intertwining tales, focuses on one familys search for love. A romantic comedy that is unmissable!

programme.title: Spacewalker
programme.desc: From the acclaimed team behind Wanted and Apollo 18. March 1965. In the heat of the Cold War, the USA and the USSR fight for supremacy in space, with both superpowers competing to be the first to have a man walk in outer space. No price is too high and no risk too great. Prepare to step into the unknown with this fascinating look into space travel. This edge-of-your-seat thriller is one to watch!

programme.title: Donovan's Echo
programme.desc: Donovan Matheson (Danny Glover) is a man trapped in the past. Once an esteemed physicist, he worked on the Manhattan Project but in the years that followed, he became engulfed in regret, which soon turned into an obsession with finding a way to use his work to do good. When his wife and child died in an accident Donovan blamed himself and his work for failing to stop it from happening. Thirty years on, Donovan returns to his home town, but instead of a welcome return he finds himself plagued by déjà vu and caught up in events that echo his family's tragedy.

programme.title: Iron Fury
programme.desc: In 1944, a courageous group of Russian soldiers managed to escape from German captivity in a half-destroyed legendary T-34 tank. Those were the times of unforgettable bravery, fierce fighting, unbreakable love, and legendary miracles. A time of unforgettable bravery, fierce fighting, unbreakable love and legendary miracles, this is a time for heroes. 'Iron Fury' is a visceral assault on the senses featuring some of the most heart stopping and authentic skirmishes ever seen on film.

programme.title: Strange But True

When they receive a visit from Melissa, Ronnie's former girlfriend at the time of his death, wounds are re-opened. Heavily pregnant, Melissa is under the belief that her unborn baby belongs to Ronnie, leaving the Chase family angry and incredulous. Stranger things have happened. But the truth is altogether more alarming...

Greg is a therapist working to build a private practice, while Alex has put a law career on hold to devote herself full-time to raising her son, a precocious four-year-old who happens to prefer Disney princesses to G.I. Joe. programme.title: Con Man

programme.title: Shake My Beauty: Episode 4
programme.desc: Miranda has suffered with excess body hair since her teens. After years of shaving, a year ago she finally started to embrace the hair and let it grow - and has even found the courage to show her arms and shoulders. However, showing her legs remains an obstacle that she's desperate to overcome - can she find the strength to visit the local water park with her legs on display and swim in front of crowds of people?

programme.title: Britain's Horror Homes
programme.desc: Examining the devastation caused in Carlisle when severe flooding in 2015 left most of the city underwater just before Christmas. Flood victims Stu and Jo reveal their disbelief when their family is left homeless, and aside from dealing with the aftermath of the deluge, they have to contend with the threat of opportunistic looters. Cameras also cover a disastrous basement conversion in a North London flat, a botched boiler installation in Manchester, and a Shropshire-based rental nightmare.

programme.title: Britain's Horror Homes
programme.desc: Cameras focus on Paul and Kim, a couple whose Northern Ireland home was invaded by a colony of breeding rats, and Warren, whose London flat was beset by leaks after builders began constructing another two storeys on top of his home. Plus, Marnie reveals how she became allergic to her own Greater Manchester home, and Devon duo Keith and Sally recall how their flat was wrecked by a storm.

programme.title: World's Weirdest Restaurants
programme.desc: World's Weirdest Restaurants takes you to Lviv, Ukraine where ‘The House of Legends' Restaurant lets you explore the myths and legends of the city of Lviv all while enjoying the wonderful fresh local Ukrainian cuisine. Then we visit Philadelphia, Pennsylvania where the ‘Tattooed Mom' is designed to bring the art of street culture inside, it's also the home of the Beard and Moustache club of Philadelphia. Next up we race over to the ‘Corvette Diner' in San Diego, California where the 50's are alive and kicking and the servers sing and dance their way through the day with their bouffant hair dos, poodle skirts and plenty of good natured sass.

programme.title: World's Weirdest Restaurants
programme.desc: World's Weirdest Restaurants takes you to Seattle, where ‘Teatro ZinZanni' brings you back to the 1962 World's Fair for a colourful collection of circus performances, comedy and classic cuisine of the era. Then things heat up in Ternopol, Ukraine at ‘Stary Mlyn' where a converted steam powered mill now houses a truly eccentric Ukrainian restaurant. Next up we roar into Chicago, where ‘Tommy Guns Garage' brings a 1920's Speakeasy back to life with mobsters, molls and a timeless Italian-themed menu. And finally we seek sanctuary in Paris, at ‘Le Refuge Des Fondus' where climbing over tables and drinking wine out of baby bottles is definitely de rigour.

programme.title: World's Weirdest Restaurants
programme.desc: World's Weirdest Restaurants takes you to ‘The Miner's Tavern' in Wieliczka, Poland where we dine at the bottom of a working salt mine amongst rooms and chambers peppered with ornate rock-salt structures. Then we pull up to ‘The Cove' in San Antonio, Texas to wash our car, do some laundry, shoot some hoops, and chow down at their family-friendly restaurant that features locally sourced ingredients. Next we're in Tokyo to sink our teeth into a fiendishly delicious gothic menu at ‘The Vampire Café'. And finally we burn rubber over to Alameda, California to the ‘Homeroom Racing Café' where a fresh Thai food menu is parked amongst the longest slot car track in the country.

programme.title: World's Weirdest Restaurants
programme.desc: World's Weirdest Restaurants takes you to the ‘Coffee Manufacture' in Lviv, Ukraine for a jolt of Java from their underground “coffee mine”. Then we visit ‘Bahooka' in Rosemead, California, home to over 100 aquariums and delightfully kitschy Polynesian menu. Next we're off to Chicago to visit ‘Szalas' for some hearty Polish fare in a traditional rustic mountain lodge. Finally we're in Tokyo, where the ‘Elementary School Tavern' teaches us that good food and good times is always a lesson worth remembering.

programme.title: Mother of the Bride
programme.desc: The inability to make a decision comes to a head when picking a dress. Bride Rachel and mom Robin can never agree on anything because neither one of them speaks up and voices their opinion. Terrie wades through the murky waters of indecision, trying to force someone to take a stance. Mother of the Groom Nancy wants to look sexy at son Chris's wedding. But bride Chelsea wants modesty at her Catholic wedding. Dress expert Barbara marches through the battleground between sexy and sacred, trying to find the right dress.

programme.title: Mother of the Bride

Can dress expert Terrie find a dress than makes Dan's heart throb while still making Jill conform to Karla's specific wedding colours? Pam wants a black dress that shows her cleavage. Bride Tiffany is fed up and is desperate for her mom to pick –anything! Can Margaret rally the entourage and get “the girls” to give Pam the support where she needs it?

programme.title: Mother of the Bride

Bride Mandy pushes her to find a dress that flatters her new body. Can Marian come out of her shell to embrace the new her before dissolving in a puddle of tears?

programme.title: Mother of the Bride

Can dress consultant Barbara get the entourage to focus on the finding the right frock first before entertaining the whims of the mad hatter?

programme.title: LEGO Friends Full Episodes 11-20
programme.sub-title: Girls Cartoons For Children In English
programme.desc: Full episodes compilation of LEGO Friends season 3 with episodes 11 to 20 of this fun girls cartoons for children in English. Join the fun adventures of Emma, Olivia, Stephanie, Andrea and Mia in Heartlake City in this girls movies for kids and teenagers.

programme.title: The Anomaly
programme.desc: A surprise visit from the Chief Inspector of the Night Bureau forces Mateo to hide Z-Blob, who goes on an adventure in the heart of Brooklyn.

programme.title: Cheat Code
programme.desc: Competing over who can ask Zoey to join their Sheep Week team, Logan cheats and unwittingly endangers the video game based Cyber Realm.

programme.title: The Bigger Picture
programme.desc: When the kids meddle in their teacher's dream to find test answers, they realize that in dreams, sweet little Ms. Putnam isn't so sweet... or little!

programme.title: Short Sheeped
programme.desc: Logan's desperation to prove himself leads to his capture by the Nightmare King, which leaves his friends to face the Sheep Week finals alone.

programme.title: The Grim Escape
programme.desc: The Dream Chasers rush to save Logan from the Shadowkeep's dungeon, but the liberators soon become the prisoners in a nightmarish twist of fate.

programme.title: Legacy, Vehicle and Mechs
programme.desc: Zane takes help from Nya for backup memories of their adventures to the Samurai X Cave computer, but Zane encounters a mysterious puzzle buried deep within his code. Nya digitizes Jay and uploads him into Zane's mind. Jay reviews memories of the Ninja's various motorcycles, mechs and planes in order to solve the vehicle-themed puzzle.

programme.title: The Good, The Bad And The Tightwad
programme.desc: Clay wakes up in the poor town of Nothing Hill which literally have nothing. Will Clay remember who he is and what he is fighting for. His friends try to help him, but Jorah Tightwad and his Bots get in the way. Clay as the Gray Knight wakes up far away in a place called Nothing Hill. A poor town where they literally have nothing. They harvest dust. Jorah Tightwad though has found that there is gold underneath the town. He convinces the confused Clay to help him put pressure on the poor townsfolk to give up their lots. This is an easy job for the strong Gray Knight. The NEXO KNIGHTS finally track him down and tries to convince him about who he is. But to the Gray Knight they are still his enemies, and a giant battle ensues in order to subdue the Gray Knight. At last, only Macy is left. When she begins to recite the Knights Code, some words and their meaning are able to get through the stone hard shell of the Gray Knight and the Evil that clouded him seems to disappear. Together they are able to return the ownership of the town to the villagers.

programme.title: The Book Of Monsters, Part 1
programme.desc: When Jestro the Jester finds the Book of Monsters, chaos breaks loose in the Kingdom of Knighton. Can the newly graduated Knights from the Knights' Academy save the kingdom? It's final graduation fighting exams for the latest Knights from Knights' Academy. All our new Knights demonstrate their prowess: CLAY, AARON, AXL and LANCE. PRINCESS MACY get to join them, but her father doesn't want her to graduate. As part of the entertainment, MERLOK does an amazing magic trick. His act is followed by…JESTRO, the King's Jester. He's terrible (and he should know to never follow a better act.) Everyone laughed because he's a real joke....a total failure. While Jestro roams the halls fo the King's Castle, forlorn, he hears the BOOK OF MONSTERS calling to him from Merlok's library. The book talks Jestro into gathering as many books of spells as he can carry, but they're interrupted by...Clay! As Jestro quickly pages through the Book of Monsters to attack Clay, Merlok arrives. There's a battle in the library between Jestro and Merlok. Finally, the wizard summons up his most powerful spell in self-defence. BOOM! There's a big, magical explosion and when Clay forces his way back into the library, Merlok, Jestro and the magic books are...GONE!

programme.title: The Book Of Monsters, Part 2
programme.desc: Realizing they must defend the Kingdom from Jestro's monsters, the Knights try to organize but are despondent when they discover their best advisor – Merlok the Magician – has sacrificed himself to save them. When Jestro awakens, he's been blasted miles and miles away from the King's Castle by Merlok's explosive spell. And, it seems, all the books he was trying to steal have been scattered, too. The Book of Monsters broke Jestro' fall and now he can use the book to attack the people who laughed at him. Meanwhile, the King and his newly-trained Knights pick through the rubble of Merlok's library. They'll have to figure something out, because Jestro and his newly made magic monsters attack King's Castle! Clay organizes the Knights to defend the kingdom, but they've never worked together before. It takes all their training, plus the help of an old friend…MERLOK! Only now he's MERLOK 2.0. Ava has been piecing together what happened and discovering that the “ghost in the machine” she's been chasing is really Merlok in digital form. Now, he can use his magic digitally and he downloads just the right weapons to the struggling Knights! They finally foil Jestro's attack with Merlok's help and officially become NEXO KNIGHTS!

programme.title: The Power Of Merlok
programme.desc: When Jestro attacks a village on the far side of the Kingdom, the NEXO-Knights wonder how they'll get there. Then Macy remembers her dad has a royal RV…maybe they can “mod” that for their own, “knightly” use? Now the NEXO-Knights get rolling…in THE FORTREX, their own ROLLING CASTLE! This great new HQ, which houses Merlok 2.0 as an operating system, will be how the knights move around Knighton and protect it from Jestro and his monsters. Speaking of the evil jester, in this episode Jestro uses some newly-made monsters to attack a town far from the capitol where he thinks he's safe from the Knights' reach. We see two parallel stories here: the Knights training, learning more about digital magic and getting organized as a team and at the same time we see Jestro making monsters, trying to learn how his powers work and talking to the Book. In the end, the Knights roll up in their castle and defeat Jestro and his marauding monsters. Lance thinks he should be the leader because he's a snot. “Of course I'm the leader…I'm a Richmond.”

programme.title: The Knights Code
programme.desc: Jestro uses the Book of Chaos to unleash, um, chaos and attack the King's hover train to try and kidnap the royal party. Can the NEXO-Knights bring order out of the chaos and save the King? Jestro finds the Book of Chaos in the countryside and decides he must feed it to the book. The Book of Monsters actually tells Jestro NOT to feed it to him he tells Jestro he's not ready for that kind of power. But Jestro doesn't listen. Now the Book unleashes chaotic monsters and Jestro uses them to attack the King and his party who are on a business-related tour of the kingdom. When the NEXO-Knights show up to stop the monster attacks and realize that they must save King and Queen Halbert – Macy's parents – from the chaotic evil monsters that have been unleashed. Clay asserts himself as leader and brings order to the knights from the chaos. He has his own book: the Book of the Knight's Code. They should all live by it.

programme.title: The Hatching
programme.desc: The Ninja learn more about the Krux and Acronix – the two fallen Elemental Masters known as the Hands of Time – and are sure that this threat has finally been eliminated. But with Wu out of action and suffering from the effects of the Time Punch, the Ninja discover a new enemy in their midst: The Vermillion Warriors. And the Ninjas have no idea who controls them...

programme.title: A Time Of Traitors
programme.desc: Kai's investigation of a Vermillion Warrior Helmet leads him to discover that Krux is alive and well in Ninjago, living under an assumed identity. Meanwhile, as the Vermillion Warriors go on a kidnapping spree, Lloyd struggles with his role as master-in-training and Nya does her best to reboot Zane, who was knocked off line in his first battle with the Vermillion.

programme.title: The Mask Of Deception
programme.desc: When an unknown criminal syndicate threatens the Royal Family, the Ninja are called back into action and must protect the royal princess and a fabled artifact that may hold supernatural powers. The ninja find themselves scattered to the four corners of the kingdom. Cole and Jay are searching in vain for some sign of Master Wu. Nya fights injustice in the north, while Kai and Zane attempt to fend off an angry lava beast in the west. This leaves Lloyd alone in Ninjago City. He rushes to the scene of a heist at Borg Tower and finds himself up against a team of highly trained operatives led by the mysterious masked MISTER-E. Lloyd fails to prevent the heist and an ancient artifact, the MASK OF DECEPTION, is stolen. Lloyd apprehends one of the criminals but the others escape. Dismayed by his failure, Lloyd calls the ninjas back to Ninjago. The friends are reunited and hope for a little rest and relaxation. These hopes are dashed with the arrival MASTER HUTCHINS, a servant of the Royal Family of Ninjago, who has been sent by the EMPEROR to request their help. A new criminal gang, SONS OF GARMADON (SOG), is attempting to acquire three ancient masks called the ONI MASKS, which are rumored to possess supernatural powers.

programme.title: The Jade Princess
programme.desc: In the wake of an assassination attempt targeting the royal family, the ninja invite the royal princess, HARUMI, into their makeshift family. Lloyd glimpses someone escaping over the rooftops with a sack on their back. Fearing it is the kidnapped princess, Lloyd takes up the chase! He discovers to his surprise, however, that the masked intruder is none other than the princess herself, who is not quite as docile or meek as she pretends. She has a habit of sneaking out of her chambers at night to feed the homeless who surround the Imperial Palace. This revelation only endears her to Lloyd more and Harumi and Lloyd quickly strike up a friendship. Unfortunately, trouble catches up to the ninja when the Sons Of Garmadon target the second Oni mask and attack the palace. The scope of the attack proves more than the Ninja were prepared for as the Sons of Garmadon detonate a series of subterranean bombs, bringing down part of the palace. Lloyd and Harumi escape onto the flying ship, DESTINY'S BOUNTY. But the victory is a pyrrhic one. The second Oni Mask has been stolen and Harumi's parents and Master Hutchins are feared lost.

programme.title: The Oni And The Dragon
programme.desc: While Princess Harumi learns to adjust to the life of a Ninja, Lloyd and Jay search for answers about the Oni Masks at Mystake's Tea house, while Cole and Zane attempt to infiltrate the Sons of Garmadon biker gang. Remembering that Lloyd managed to arrest one of the gang members at Borg Tower, the Ninja decide to interrogate him to ascertain the location of the third Oni Mask. In order to get him to talk, however, Cole suggests they visit MYSTAKE'S TEA HOUSE to obtain some "truth tea." The truth-tea backfires spectacularly when Cole accidentally switches cups and drinks the tea himself. Zane is able to salvage the situation, however, and obtains a lead. He learns that the Sons of Garmadon frequent a karaoke bar called LAUGHY'S. Zane and Cole don disguises to infiltrate the bar. Cole assumes the alter ego “Rocky Dangerbuff," while Zane adopts the subtler moniker "Snake Jaguar." In order to earn the gang's trust, Cole performs a karaoke routine that is a smash success. Unfortunately, during the routine, his disguise comes loose and he is exposed as a ninja. The Sons of Garmadon attack him, and Zane (who is still in disguise) is unable to intervene. Cole is taken prisoner while Zane is invited back to the Sons of Garmadon's secret base.

programme.title: Smurfing For Ghosts
programme.desc: Peewit is at the castle of his friends Selwyn and Tallulah when Uncle Fenwick, the friendly ghost, asks for his help in chasing a few relatives who've come to haunt him... Peewit has to get help from the Smurfs, and a merry chase begins...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Journey To The Centre Of The Smurf: Winter is setting in on the Village of the Smurfs. The little Smurfs are freezing. But what is Clumsy doing with this strange rock he's discovered? And why is Miner Smurf so enthusiastic about their new discovery? Surely, one more addition to Clumsy's rock collection is not worth all this hoopla... The Smurfs will discover danger and surprises when they go underground.

programme.title: A Bell For Azrael
programme.desc: Gargamel puts a spell on a bell attached to Azrael's tail that will lead the cat to the Smurfs. Papa Smurf outwits him with a counter-spell that leads the wizard to Big Mouth instead of the tasty Smurfs.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Gingerbread Smurfs: Brainy feels up to the occasion when he starts the recipe for cookies. He is sure to win the contest: he borrowed a recipe from Papa Smurf's Book of Magic. But a big surprise, and some nasty happenings, await poor Brainy... and the whole Village.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Papa's Wedding Day: When the flower fairy Nymph arrives at the Smurf Village, all the Smurfs fall for her charm and wit. And soon they learn that she is to be some sort of Mama Smurf to them...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Incredible Shrinking Wizard: Gargamel has thrown in his slime pond so much poisonous muck that the water becomes enchanted and Gargamel, after falling in, suddenly finds himself much smaller that he would wish. Actually he is going to be so small that Papa Smurf will save him!

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Greedy Goes On Strike: Get up early in the morning, before any other Smurf is out of bed, to prepare a scrumptious Smurfberry muffin. Spend all morning on preparing Smurf delicacies for lunch. Than all afternoon to have dinner ready – and delicious – on time. And do you get so much as a thank you form the Smurfs? So Greedy Smurf quits. The Village is in trouble... And soon, so is Greedy.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Petrified Smurfs: Brainy Smurf's done it again. This time, in front of Papa Smurf, too. He has recited a spell that changes everything to stone. Everything including himself and all the Smurfs and the Village, and the forest around for miles... Fortunately, Peewit appears....

programme.title: Smurfing In Sign Language
programme.desc: The Smurfs meet a woodland elf, who teaches them sign language after Gargamel inflicts a no-speaking potion on them.

programme.title: The Gargoyle Of Quarrel Castle
programme.desc: In Quarrel Castle, you almost never hear a kind word. Both Selwyn the Warlock and Tallulah, his witch-mate, spend their time quarrelling. Tharp, their pet gargoyle, takes refuge in the Village of Smurfs. But something terrible is going to happen....

programme.title: Jokey's Joke Book
programme.desc: Jokey Smurf's joke boxes are no longer funny to the other Smurfs. Jokey finds new ideas in his Great Joke Book, but these ideas are even less popular in the Village. And here comes the evil Gargamel with a few jokes of his own...

programme.title: Return To Don Smurfo
programme.desc: When a drop of Papa Smurf's new potion spills on the Smurflings' adventure book, the fictional hero springs to life. The dashing Don Smurfo, willing to rid the Smurf of the evil Gargamel, gallantly captures him...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Flighty's Plight: Flighty Smurf, as his name implies, can't make his own mind up about anything. The other Smurfs take him to the forest for a survival test in which he can find his way home only by making decisions. He ends up in Balthazar's castle.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - No Smurf Is An Island: Handy Smurf is the one who fixes everything that needs mending in the Village of the Smurfs. But are his efforts really appreciated by the other Smurfs? Not at all. At least this is what Handy feels when he resolves to leave the Smurfs Village forever and live in the sea with Marina the Mermaid...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Born Rotten: As the Smurfs prepare for the Festival of the Stars, Gargamel plants a creature in their midst that smells so rotten that he can easily be traced to the Smurf village. Papa Smurf realizes that Born Rotten is from another planet, and he instructs Feathers to return him to his home before Gargamel finds them.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Never Smurf Off Till Tomorrow: A fierce wind carries the Smurfs' windmill away, with several Smurfs inside. Is Lazy Smurf really at fault or is an injustice being committed? Are the captive Smurfs going to be saved from the volcano's crater? Is Brainy going to smurf up his mouth for a moment?

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Marco Smurf And The Pepper Pirates: The Smurfs sail off in their sailing boat to save Marco Smurf, who has been captured at sea by Captain Pepper. Marina and a dolphin help to free Marco.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Baby's First Christmas: The wonderful joy of Christmas for Baby Smurf and everyone else is almost ruined by the evil Chlorhydris who puts a spell on Mr. Nicholas to stop him from spreading holiday cheer. Fortunately, Papa Smurf and his little blue creatures break the spell and Christmas spreads over the land once more.

programme.title: Gormandizing Greedy
programme.desc: Greedy overdoes it. He's getting heavier and heavier until his weight puts him in jeopardy. The evil Gargamel is going to catch him... Can Greedy be saved by Papa Smurf?

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - A Pet For Baby Smurf: There is a prize for the cutest pet of a Smurf. Baby Smurf brings a cute, lovely, affectionate Glowing Darling, a pet anybody falls in love with… But this pet is a creation of Gargamel, the evil wizard intent on destroying the Smurfs!

programme.title: My Mum's a Doctor
programme.desc: The Teletubbies watch a little girl whose Mum has a very special job. Po has too much Tubby Custard and Tubby Custard Tummy and there's time foe one more dance before Tubby Bye-Bye.

programme.desc: The Teletubbies have their favourite things, but where's Po's scooter? The Teletubbies and a group of children watch Tamzin Griffin pretend to be Funny Lady and tell the story of the naughty buzzy bee.

programme.title: Naughty Cloud
programme.desc: The Teletubbies dance around a tree. The Teletubbies and a group of children watch Tamzin Griffin pretend to be Funny Lady and tell the story of the naughty cloud.

programme.desc: The Teletubbies and a group of children see Tamzin Griffin pretend to be Funny Lady and tell the story of the naughty snake.

programme.sub-title: Season 1 - Smoke without Fire | The Daltons play rugby | The Daltons go Wrestling
programme.desc: The prairie suddenly fills with smoke signals… shaped like death skulls! Peabody's convinced this means the Indians are about to attack, and demands help from the army. Instead of troops he gets a single veteran, a sergeant-instructor whose mission is to teach inmates how to fight. Joe plans to use the rifles they'll be given to make his big break …but the sergeant assigns them all to heavy duty training before he gets the chance!

programme.title: The Daltons
programme.sub-title: Season 1 - Locked Outside | Dots and Stripes | The Daltons go Time-travelling
programme.desc: After a fire alert, prison staff and inmates are locked outside. Peabody left the key… inside! Everyone is locked out except for the Daltons - they were so busy digging a tunnel they didn't hear the alarm. Peabody and his guards try and get back inside, but Joe decides it's better being “ locked up free than locked out as a prisoner ” …the Daltons settle down to enjoy this new turns of events…

programme.title: Oggy and the Cockroaches
programme.sub-title: Season 4 - Wrestling Time! | Washing day! | (Un)Happy Camper
programme.desc: Jack convinces Oggy to sign up for a wrestling contest that Bob is organizing. It turns out Oggy is actually pretty good at it! Dee-Dee wants to participate in the contest, but Jack sends him packing. That wasn't counting on Dee-Dee's determination... | Oggy is getting ready to hang up the laundry. But this totally inoffensive activity is going to turn into a delirious and hysterical ordeal, because the roaches are going to use the laundry line in order to make an acrobatic Tyrolean rope... | Olivia and Oggy head off in their camping car for a beach vacation! The roaches come along for the ride and decide to ruin Oggy's vacation!

programme.title: The Daltons
programme.sub-title: Season 1 - Up, up and away! | Oil Leak | The Daltons get recycled
programme.desc: Why climb up walls, if walls can float YOU up? Joe has a new amazing scheme – he'll change the penitentiary into a giant hot air balloon! But he didn't reckon on air currents…

programme.title: Oggy and the Cockroaches
programme.sub-title: Season 4 - Very Special Deliveries | Into the Wild! | Oggy Splits Hairs
programme.desc: Bob hires Oggy and Jack as delivery boys. They have a shiny new truck full of boxes to deliver. They're certainly not pros at this but they do their best until the roaches start trying to sabotage their rounds... | Oggy and Jack decide to hike the trail that crosses Corsica. So do the roaches. They sabotage Oggy's compass and the two cats get lost in the wild, which turns out to be pretty frightening. Mosquitoes and nasty wild boars are there to greet them... | Oggy's living room has been turned into a hairdressing salon. Bob wants his hair styled in beauty. But the roaches tie Oggy up in his smock and grab the scissors. And Bob gets the most incredibly horrible hair cut this side of Mars.

programme.title: The Daltons
programme.sub-title: Season 1 - Not exactly Aztec | Buffalo Bluff | Jungle Jinx
programme.desc: While digging their umpteenth tunnel, the Daltons find themselves inside an Aztec Temple – complete with a mummy, a scroll covered with mysterious signs … and no way out. William uses his almanac to decipher the scroll… and finds instructions to a secret passage out. The Daltons try to find it, but the ancient temple is rife with Indiana Jones style traps, inside walls or beneath the flagstones…

programme.title: The Daltons
programme.desc: Mexico's army invades the United States! Well, first they attack the penitentiary, they'll decide on the rest later. Mexican forces besiege the prison, led by Santa Anna. The inmates flee in a hot air balloon. But Miss Betty and Rintindumb fall into Santa Anna's clutches! Peabody and the Daltons come back to rescue them..

programme.title: The Daltons
programme.sub-title: Teen Trouble | Size-Wise | and the Beanstalk
programme.desc: Without realising it, Fabulous Falcon invents a Rejuvenation potion. Miss Betty drinks it and, oops! She's a rebellious teenager! The penitentiary has no right to lock up minors! The Daltons nab the potion and transform themselves into kids…

programme.title: The Daltons
programme.sub-title: Season 1 - The New Warden | Magnetic Joe | Morse code
programme.desc: Washington dispatches a government envoy to the penitentiary, equipped with a machine to synthesize, analyse and calculate data. Then, out of thousands of candidates, it selects the best individual for a given position. The Machine analyses what it takes to run the Penitentiary… and Joe Dalton is appointed Warden! Peabody gets fired… and Miss Betty goes on strike.

programme.title: Cry Babies Magic Tears
programme.desc: The Cry Babies Tutti Frutti's are collecting apples when, suddenly, they find a worm in one of them. The babies want the worm to leave the piece of fruit, but it hypnotises Angie and makes her believe that she now has to live in the apple. The other Cry Babies have no idea what is going on: Angie's behaviour is really strange and she is always together with the worm. When the other Cry Babies realise the worm is hypnotising their friend, Angie explains that the family of Gusi, the worm, need a home. Will the Cry Babies help Angie and her new friend the worm? programme.title: Champions: Sweden
programme.desc: Three-time Olympic medallist and 2012 FIFA World Women's Coach of the Year Pia Sundhage recalls her reaction at being called up to join the Swedish women's national team. Speaking to Stina Blackstenius, FIFA Women's World Cup Bronze Medal and two Olympic Games Silver Medal winner, and Molly Johansson, both players for BK Häcken, Pia explains her belief that football gave her a way of life. She relates the feelings she had when she took part in the Olympic Games, and how playing in France made her stronger, while Molly shares her goals for the future.

programme.title: Break Point: a Davis Cup Story
programme.desc: Led by Rafa Nadal, the Spanish team were this year's favourite until they suffered a serious setback. The team's number two player, Roberto Bautista, had to leave the competition for his hometown to be at his father´s side during the last hours of his life. Without Bautista, Nadal and Feliciano López heroically managed to lead the team into the final. But then came the news that thrilled tennis fans worldwide: Bautista is coming back to the competition after his father´s funeral, and he´s ready to play. United again, the members of the Spanish team fight for victory in the grand final, where something far beyond tennis is at stake.

programme.title: SEVE
programme.desc: Seve Ballesteros was an artist, a golfing Picasso. He was a fighter against back injury, rivals on the golf course, a disintegrating swing, and finally cancer. He remains a legend, a multi-major champion and the man who made the modern Ryder Cup. This is his story, from members of his inner circle, other sporting greats and from himself via newly unearthed material.

programme.title: Wildlife Diaries Australia
programme.desc: Lone Pine Koala Sanctuary was opened in 1927 at a time when Koalas were still being killed on a large scale for the fur trade. Today, hardly anything threatens the natural habitats of these animals as much as the desertification of the forests. We let the drones fly and are there when a new tree is planted.

programme.title: Wildlife Diaries Australia
programme.desc: Visiting the fenced nature reserve Arid Recovery in southern Australia, we witness the care of an injured kangaroo and follow researchers at the Hidden Vale Wildlife Centre near Brisbane as they train native animals to detect tracks of threatening predators and then move to safety.

programme.title: Wildlife Diaries Australia
programme.sub-title: Of Fairy Penguins and GPS Trackers
programme.desc: Australia's largest fur seal colony is located on Phillip Island. Night after night, a breathtaking spectacle takes place here: At sunset, countless fairy penguins return from their hunt for fish. In the station near the penguin colony, pioneering scientific research is conducted around the cute animals. We learn how dedicated scientists are trying to secure the future of the fairy penguins with the help of GPS trackers.

programme.title: Wild & Wide Awake
programme.sub-title: From the Mediterranean to the Alps
programme.desc: The first part of the spring journey takes us from the Spanish inland to the rugged Atlantic and to the Mediterranean, through the French Provence, and finally into the Alps. Along the way, flamingos perform their bizarre dancing rituals, wild horses storm through the wetland… While the North is still covered by snow and ice, the South will soon turn into a blooming garden and every creature is enjoying the first signs of the awakening.

programme.title: Dreams of the Settlers
programme.sub-title: An American Journey: Through Utah's Canyons to Salt Lake City
programme.desc: It's a dream route leading from the casino metropolis of Las Vegas, to Salt Lake City, the Mormon capital. It is a journey that follows the footsteps of the first settlers: the Mormons. They came to this desert belt of the United States during the second half of the 19th century to escape persecution and in search of the promised land. Some of them founded Las Vegas. Others moved through the canyons and over the mountains of the colossal Colorado Plateau, where they found water and pasture, to establish many small settlements. The landscapes through which they trekked, had and still have, a breathtaking and bizarre majestic beauty. Bryce Canyon, the hogbacks and the Escalante Staircase plateau are dramatic scenes of wonder formed from rock. The Pajute Indians once described Bryce Canyon as: “red rocks standing like men in a basin”.

programme.title: Dreams of the Settlers
programme.sub-title: An American Journey: Through Louisiana Along the Mississippi
programme.desc: The vast Delta of the Mississippi River is the gateway to the South of the United States. It always has been. This is where our journey begins: through Louisiana along the banks of the mighty river, to the big inland city of New Orleans, founded long ago by the French. Further inland, sugarcane plantations and the villas of their former owners stretch as far as the eye can see. To the north, we leave the river and, taking spectacular roads, we pass through the swamplands of the Mississippi, which were once impenetrable, serving as the ideal hideout for many a runaway. Bordering Texas, where the swamplands end, is the beginning of the vast cattle country. This is home to the last remaining cowboys in the United States who, still today, maintain their French cultural heritage.

programme.title: The Seychelles
programme.desc: The 115 islands and islets that make up the Seychelles present a breath-taking variety of plants, rare animals and beaches laced with palms. This is where the leg-endary Coco de Mer palm nuts grow with fruits weigh-ing up to 20 kilos and giant wild land turtles nibble away at mangrove fruits to their hearts content. The archipelago was first settled at the end of the 18th cen-tury. Today, a very colourful potpourri of peoples in this dwarf state proves just how peacefully different cultures can live side by side. Three times a week, the steamer "MV Espoir" completes the trip from the main island of Mahé to Praslin and back. A ship for every-one and practically everything: Used cars, toilet paper, horses, bicycles, furniture - you name it, the Espoir transports goods of all kinds. Coconuts sometimes pose a problem as there are far too many of them. What to do with them? The best place to send them is undoubt-edly Hubert Roumien's Virgin Coconut Oil Laboratory, hidden away in the Mahé jungle. Straw turns into gold at Seaweed Seychelles! There, Benjamin Port Louis collects seaweed and extracts liquid fertiliser from it.

programme.title: Evolving Earth
programme.desc: Philippe travels to Utah where scientists have discovered a massive amount of dinosaur bones and explores an area where dinosaur footprints have been preserved. Then he visits Hawaii to see how the island chain evolved from volcanoes and tours an old coal mine in Pennsylvania to see how fossil fuels are formed.

programme.title: Extinction Earth
programme.desc: Philippe explores Yellowstone National Park, the site of a potential super-volcano visits Meteor Crater in Arizona, the site where a meteor once struck 50,000 years ago and travels to the Hawaiian Island of Maui, where powerful telescopes search the universe for meteors that might be heading our way.

programme.title: Forests
programme.desc: Philippe looks at ways scientists are measuring the health of our forests. In New England, he visits a white pine forest that is being threatened by invasive plants. At the University of California Santa Cruz, he discovers how students are using sonic-tomography to look inside trees to detect signs of disease. At the Pine Barrens of New Jersey, he discovers why the pitch pine tree is able to withstand occasional wildfires. And in Los Angeles, he discovers how volunteers are planting trees to create an urban forest.

programme.title: 1990 Official Film, Soccer Shoot-Out

It included 'The Hand of God 2' from Diego Maradona, the eccentricity of Rene Higuita, the lovable cheek of Paul Gascoigne, the hip,wiggling of Roger Milla and an audacious attempt to divide Naples, while also recalling West Germany's dramatic victories over the Netherlands, England and Argentina en route to glory.

The journey won't be easy, but through sacrifice and hard work even the wildest dreams can become a reality.

programme.title: SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 2, Germany
programme.desc: A definite highlight in this FIBO edition in Germany, Strongman Champions League introduced its new rules for a special team item. Graham Hicks tries here to set a New World Record on the biggest log in the world, currently held by Krzysztof Radzikowski. Boosted also by the presence of the acclaimed in the strongman circles names of Mark Felix and Danis Zageris.

programme.title: SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 3, Lithuania
programme.desc: This weekend sees the Strongman Champions League Log Lift World Championships in Lithuania. Big lifting names such as Graham Hicks , Vidas Blekaitis and Vytatus Lalas are in the startlist to push some big numbers.

programme.title: SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 4, Holland
programme.desc: The battle of the Dutch will take place this edition in Lichtenvoorde, a place very well known in Holland because of the famous “Black Cross”. The athletes will compete over six heavy events and the winner gets 25 Strongman Champions League ranking points.

programme.title: SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 5, Serbia
programme.desc: Set in the beautiful mountain resort Zlatibor, the fifth stage of the Strongman Champions League 2017 sees 14 athletes from across the world competing for the gold medal of SCL Serbia 2017. The event welcomes top-athlete - and odds-on favourite - Matjaz Belsak (Slovenia), who has presented himself in an impressive shape so far. Can his opponents defeat him?

programme.title: SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 6, Canada (Part 1)
programme.desc: The next two stages take place in Quebec. With eight events over two days, SCL Canada is a true ‘heavyweight'. The athletes compete in: Truck Pull, Deadlift with cars, Log Lift, and the Atlas Stones. The World's Strongest Viking Jean-Francois Caron from Canada is a favourite, as well as current SCL leader Matjaz Belsak (Slovenia) and promising underdog Jimmy Paquet (Canada).

programme.title: SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 7, Canada (Part 2)
programme.desc: Welcome to the second day in Quebec. The athletes are fighting hard to win this two-day event. The last points of this SCL stage can be won over four outstanding disciplines: Power Stairs, Dumbbell Press, Keg Toss, and finally, the legendary Farmer's Walk. Who will leave Canada with the yellow ‘Leader Shirt'?

programme.title: SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 8, Finland (Part 1)
programme.desc: Stages 8 and 9 of the SCL are hosted in Vaasa, Finland, taking place over a spectacular two-day event. After 3 wins so far, Matjaz Belsak from Slovenia plans to extend his lead at the top of the table. Among the other 13 highly motivated strongmen, two SCL legends will make their comeback to the competition: Former World Champion of 2015, Krzysztof Radzikowski (Poland) and Dainis Zageris (Latvia).
